messages.title: LIB DEM SUPPORT GROWING says Craig Dobson
messages.content: LIB DEM SUCCESS IN LEADERS DEBATE - Read more below

messages.title: NICK CLEGG AND VINCE CABLE - A FORMIDABLE TEAM
messages.content: Nick was clear winner of the first election debate and Vince, came out on top in the chancellors' debate, and is respected for his foresight regarding the banking collapse.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable are respected for their foresight regarding the banking collapse.

quotes.text: I think we have a real chance to change the political set up in this country. A Lib Dem vote is the only vote with real change.

images.caption: Photographs of Craig Dobson, Nick Clegg, and Vince Cable

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes poll data from 'The Sun', 'Independent', and 'Mail on Sunday' indicating changes in percentage support for political parties such as the Conservatives, Labour, and the Liberal Democrats.
